trans-unit.source: Executes the operation on a table.
trans-unit.target: Executes the operation on a table.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableOperation</codeEntityReference> object that represents the operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableOperation</codeEntityReference> object that represents the operation to perform.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableResult</codeEntityReference> containing the result of executing the operation on the table.

trans-unit.source: Executes the operation on a table, using the specified <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> and <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: Executes the operation on a table, using the specified <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableRequestOptions</codeEntityReference> and <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference>.
